channel.title: Argonite 484
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bXXJn.png[/img]
[U]Introduction on the server [/U] Since 474 was getting boring we decided to go the 484
This server is based off Hyperion which is written by Graham.This server will not be any remake or anything we still do not know what we are doing with this server yet we are just working on stuff we feel on working on.
[COLOR=orange][B]Progress - [/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Not started[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Working on[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Completed[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]Minigames - [/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Barrows[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working Npcs with effects[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Woking chests[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working Killcount[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working heads[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Rocks Hitting on you & different rock sizes for the hits[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Last npc spawns at the chest[/COLOR]
[COLOR=green]Mage Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working npcs[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Npcs transforming[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]Fight Pits[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Timer waiting[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Orb Viewing[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Npc's spawn after awhile[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Reward system[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]2nd Map region[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Wave System[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Npcs working[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Staking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Rules[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Misc.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Warriors Guild[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Animator[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Cyclopes[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Skills[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Woodcutting[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Different Stump for tree types[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Random Tree comes to life[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]FireMaking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Clipped[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Walking backwards[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Supports all logs[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Color logs[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Cooking[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Cooking Gauntlets[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Cooking fish[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Pie Making[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Fishing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Fletching[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Herblore[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Slayer[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Agility[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Crafting[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Mining[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Smithing[/COLOR]
[COLOR=yellow]RuneCrafting[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working pouches[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Working altars[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Multiply[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Abby's[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]Thieving[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/6o3igj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/34t4979.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/309qwlk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/25z2omx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10cix5g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/3521548.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/vyl9gg.png[/img]

Credits [COLOR=silver]Graham[/COLOR] [COLOR=silver]Men(from a diff site)[/COLOR] [COLOR=silver]Scully[/COLOR] [COLOR=silver]Hybrent & Paul(xlogic)[/COLOR] [COLOR=silver]Thing1[/COLOR]

item.title: Argonite 484
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Looks nice.

A suggestion, though: Use orange instead of yellow for the progress because yellow is hard to read with moparscape’s background. I always have to highlight it and then read it.

Read full topic
